# @postman/runtime.rpc-socket.io

This package contains a Socket.IO implementation of the [Runtime-RPC protocol](../runtime-rpc).

This package is compatible with both Node.js and browser-like environments. In Node.js, the `Client` and `Server` classes are both available. In browser-like environments, only the `Client` is available.

## Example

Client:

```ts
import { createRemoteRuntime } from '@postman/runtime'
import { Client } from '@postman/runtime.runtime-rpc-socket.io';

function connect(socket) {
  const client = new Client({ socket });
  const runtime = createRemoteRuntime({ client });

  // ...
}
```

Server:

```ts
import { Server } from '@postman/runtime.runtime-rpc-socket.io';
import { ServerMethods } from '@postman/runtime';

function connect(socket) {
  const server = new Server(ServerMethods, { socket });
}
```
